last_episode_to_air.name: Sinker, Sailor, Squirrel, Spy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Scaredy, Dave and Mildred try to save Balsa from the evil Otters.

name: Scaredy Squirrel
overview: Scaredy Squirrel is a Canadian animated television series created by Mélanie Watt.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothing
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets into a prank war.

episodes.name: Fistful Of Quarters
episodes.overview: Scaredy helps Dave find the perfect job when he runs out of quarters for his fire truck.

episodes.name: Children Of The Acorn
episodes.overview: After searching every dangerous corner of Balsa City, Scaredy has to entertain a little girl in order to win back the acorn hat he needs to complete his collection.

episodes.name: Awaken The Stacker Within
episodes.overview: Scaredy meets his hero, Lars Von Stacking, and attempts to help the former star rebuild his confidence as well as his greatest achievement, the Broccolisseum.

episodes.name: Way Of The Fishlips
episodes.overview: Scaredy needs help getting Rex to stop bullying him.

episodes.name: The Golden Paddleball
episodes.overview: Scaredy and Paddy share a paddleball.

episodes.name: Luck Be A Penny
episodes.overview: Scaredy loses his lucky penny and receives bad luck.

episodes.name: How To Succeed In Groceries
episodes.overview: Running a rule-free Stash N' Hoard is not all that easy.

episodes.name: Lumberjack Day
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to rid a sacred holiday of commercialization.

episodes.name: Suggestion Box Blues
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets a suggestion box.

episodes.name: The Tubtastic Tuo
episodes.overview: Momma forces Scaredy and Nestor to become a team.

episodes.name: Mr. Nestor's Mother's Momma
episodes.overview: Scaredy loses Nestor's grandmother.

episodes.name: Sticky Situation
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets a stain on his uniform and does anything he can in order to hide it.

episodes.name: Cowlicked
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets his fur cowlicked, and needs it to be flat again in order to enter a paddleball tournament.

episodes.name: Water Damage
episodes.overview: Scaredy loses his job when his ears are blocked by water.

episodes.name: Life Saver
episodes.overview: Sally transforms into Scaredy.

episodes.name: Who's Your Paddy
episodes.overview: Paddy wants to get Scaredy fired.

episodes.name: Snerd Envy
episodes.overview: Scardey makes his own snerd.

episodes.name: Dream Weaver
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to make Nestor's dreams come true.

episodes.name: Chili Con Scaredy
episodes.overview: After his wallet is stolen, Scaredy must work at a chili place, but he ends up revealing that his new boss has been stealing wallets.

episodes.name: The Coast Is Fear
episodes.overview: Scaredy is afraid of going on a roller coaster.

episodes.name: The Madness Of King Nutbar
episodes.overview: A king's insanity causes a candy bar to discontinue.

episodes.name: There Is No "I" In Groceries
episodes.overview: Scaredy works for a rival grocery store with a strangely familiar staff.

episodes.name: When Thugs Attack
episodes.overview: Rumours about a gang gets out of control.

episodes.name: Camp Or Consequences
episodes.overview: The campsite becomes more strict when paddleballs are taken away.

episodes.name: Fairweather Squirrel
episodes.overview: Scaredy becomes the new TV weatherman.

episodes.name: Aisle Of The Dead
episodes.overview: Everyone in Balsa City becomes zombies.

episodes.name: Where The Stink At?
episodes.overview: Dave can no longer fart.

episodes.name: Stackinator
episodes.overview: Scaredy is replaced by a robot at work.

episodes.name: Halloweekend
episodes.overview: Scaredy is determined to scare someone on Halloween.

episodes.name: Rockabye Rock
episodes.overview: Scaredy takes care of a rock while Richard is away for the weekend.

episodes.name: Hammock Havoc
episodes.overview: The robot that came with Scaredy's hammock is too pushy.

episodes.name: It's Not Easy Being Green
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to grow Richard taller for a contest.

episodes.name: The Corgin
episodes.overview: Scaredy and Dave go to the mountains.

episodes.name: Nothing But The Tooth
episodes.overview: Scaredy loses a tooth and tries to dupe the Molar Owl.

episodes.name: From Rodent With Love
episodes.overview: Scaredy uncovers Mildrid's secret.

episodes.name: Paddle Dogs
episodes.overview: Dave gets a job as a towel boy for the Paddle Dogs.

episodes.name: Looking For Richard
episodes.overview: Scaredy looks for a lost Richard.

episodes.name: Fancy Some Tea?
episodes.overview: The store is getting too fancy.

episodes.name: Mr. Perfect Balsa
episodes.overview: Scaredy regrets signing up for the Mr. Perfect Balsa Competition.

episodes.name: Shop Cop
episodes.overview: Scaredy becomes the security guard for the store.

episodes.name: Acting Silly
episodes.overview: Scaredy develops a crush on female squirrel, which makes Sally very jealous.

episodes.name: Seth Is A Salesman
episodes.overview: A smooth salesman dupes Scaredy.

episodes.name: Less Nestorman
episodes.overview: Nestor loses his job to his brother, Lestor.

episodes.name: Neat Wits
episodes.overview: Scaredy coaches Dave in an attempt to win cleaning supplies.

episodes.name: Mall Rats
episodes.overview: Scaredy learns a secret about Paddy.

episodes.name: The Great Mistack
episodes.overview: Dave becomes a celebrity, which takes a toll on his friendship with Scaredy.

episodes.name: A Squirreled Away Treasure
episodes.overview: A treasure map leads to an adventure.

episodes.name: Perfect Pickle
episodes.overview: A search for a perfect pickle lands Scaredy in trouble.

episodes.name: Goat Police
episodes.overview: Scaredy re-creates his favorite cop drama.

episodes.name: Jawhead
episodes.overview: Scaredy lands a job protecting Balsa City from a river monster.

episodes.name: Store Wars
episodes.overview: Two stores compete to reach a million customers.

episodes.name: Grand Olde Grocery
episodes.overview: Scaredy regrets getting Sally a singing job.

episodes.name: Grounded Hog
episodes.overview: Balsa's groundhog is a monster.

episodes.name: The Talented Mr. Peacock
episodes.overview: Scaredy and Philmore partner up for a doubles paddleball tournament.

episodes.name: Hiccup Hicdown in Balsatown
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to cure Dave's hiccups before everyone goes crazy.

episodes.name: Lean Green Fighting Machine
episodes.overview: A mad man wants to eat the world's strongest plant.

episodes.name: Nutters Almanac
episodes.overview: A book that predicts future weather if found.

episodes.name: I Think Therefore I Clean
episodes.overview: Scaredy's new vacuum takes over Balsa City.

episodes.name: Soup or Nova
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to find Dave a new place to live.

episodes.name: Extrasquirrelstial
episodes.overview: Alien Squirrels arrive in Balsa.

episodes.name: To Cat A Thief
episodes.overview: Scaredy finds out that someone is planning to steal the Leaning Tower of Pizza.

episodes.name: Inskunktion
episodes.overview: Scaredy has to wake up Dave by going into his dreams.

episodes.name: Double Double Squirrel In Trouble
episodes.overview: Scaredy switches places with a movie star.

episodes.name: The New Dave
episodes.overview: Dave becomes a jerk when he starts riding a motorcycle.

episodes.name: Empty Nestor Syndrome
episodes.overview: Momma makes Scaredy her new son when Nestor moves out.

episodes.name: Breaking The Mold
episodes.overview: Scaredy battles a mold that everyone else in Balsa has fallen in love with.

episodes.name: Hip To Be Squirrel
episodes.overview: When the Stash N' Hoard is deemed UN-hip by a TV trend setter Scaredy has to save the store from being closed.

episodes.name: Captain Nuts
episodes.overview: Scaredy believes a bug bite gave him super powers.

episodes.name: Nobody Loves Hatton
episodes.overview: Scaredy finds out that Hatton has been skipping the Stash N' Hoard Valentine's Dance.

episodes.name: Stash 'N Hoarder
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries not to hoard acorns as fall approaches.

episodes.name: Ice Ice Scaredy
episodes.overview: Scaredy must face a haunting memory if he wants his friends to win an ice skating competition.

episodes.name: The Paddy Party Problem
episodes.overview: Upon realizing that he has never thrown a good party, Scaredy wants to show everyone that he can.

episodes.name: Hamsitcorn
episodes.overview: A mysterious creature that only Scaredy can see seems to picking on him for no reason.

episodes.name: Freaky Fur Day
episodes.overview: Scaredy and Dave magically switch bodies and need to switch back before Dave is due to compete in a grotesque hotdog eating contest.

episodes.name: Mascot In The Act
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets a mascot job and then discovers the team isn't as good as they seem.

episodes.name: Double Ooh Oops
episodes.overview: Scaredy accidentally outs Mildred as a spy and, after her capture, must go on a mission to rescue her.

episodes.name: Stack To School
episodes.overview: It is discovered that Scaredy is one credit shy of his stacking degree and must return to college to pass.

episodes.name: Store Trek
episodes.overview: After Nestor is kicked out of his medieval reenactment group, Scaredy has to get Nestor out of his funk before the big store inspection.

episodes.name: Safety Corner Conundrum
episodes.overview: When Safety Corner gets put on Balsa TV, Scaredy loses control of his own show.

episodes.name: Adventures In Frogsitting
episodes.overview: Scaredy loses Mildred's nephew while babysitting with Dave.

episodes.name: Straighten Up And Flu Right
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to get rid of Dave's flu with Dave's mother's help.

episodes.name: Abracagrandma
episodes.overview: Scaredy performs a magic act that makes Grandmomma vanish.

episodes.name: Momma Lisa Smile
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to help Mr. Nestor's Mother smile for the very, very first time.

episodes.name: Arachnofriendly
episodes.overview: Scaredy meets a spider; Scaredy plans to prove he is a useful employee.

episodes.name: 28 Daves Later
episodes.overview: Dave photocopies himself 27 times.

episodes.name: Day Of The Stackal
episodes.overview: After a wild night stacking spree, Scaredy must prove he is innocent.

episodes.name: The Dave In Dave
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to get the store running smoothly.

episodes.name: Buck Up Buck
episodes.overview: Buck chips a tooth.

episodes.name: Ice Cream Headache
episodes.overview: Scaredy and Dave run the only ice cream truck in town.

episodes.name: Three Alarm Flyer
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets carried away writing the Sash N' Hoard's weekly flyer.

episodes.name: Driving Miss Davey
episodes.overview: Scaredy becomes a driving instructor.

episodes.name: Great Dane
episodes.overview: Scaredy is determined to make Dave and Dane friends again.

episodes.name: Fudge-Filled Fib
episodes.overview: Scaredy lies in order to get his own Squirrel Guides troop.

episodes.name: Rockin' Richard
episodes.overview: Scaredy buys a voice box for Richard.

episodes.name: Misfortune Teller
episodes.overview: A coin-operated fortune teller tells Scaredy something he doesn't want to hear.

episodes.name: Trophy Catastrophe
episodes.overview: Scaredy tries to help Dave win a trophy.

episodes.name: Encino Squirrel
episodes.overview: Scaredy thaws out a frozen squirrel and helps him adjust.

episodes.name: Udder Best Friend
episodes.overview: Scaredy encourages Dave and Millie to be friends.

episodes.name: Lost In Donations
episodes.overview: Scaredy gets takes advantage of.

episodes.name: Double Decker Danger
episodes.overview: Two thieves take advantage of Scaredy being a guide.

episodes.name: Actually, It Is Rocket Science
episodes.overview: Momma orders new shopping carts.

episodes.name: For A Few S'Mores More
episodes.overview: Scaredy must save his home from a corrupt Marshmallow Tycoon.

episodes.name: Sinker, Sailor, Squirrel, Spy
episodes.overview: Scaredy, Dave and Mildred try to save Balsa from the evil Otters.
